main event: A bright white ball of fire traveled over Tampa Bay, Florida from east to west before fading out.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The object was reported to be silver colored and circular in shape., The object was observed for approximately 3-4 minutes before it disappeared., The observer noted that the object made erratic maneuvers and sudden stops., A similar observation mentioned that the object landed on water and exploded.
